thread.title: Australia to legalise growing of medicinal cannabis
thread.title_full: Australia to legalise growing of medicinal cannabis | News24

author: news24.com
title: Australia to legalise growing of medicinal cannabis
text:
Sydney - Australia will legalise the growing of cannabis for medicinal and scientific purposes, the government announced on Saturday.
Health Minister Sussan Ley said changes to existing legislation that bans the growing of cannabis will be introduced to parliament, with the aim of providing alternate treatment for people with debilitating illnesses.
"This government is incredibly sympathetic to the suffering of those Australians with debilitating illnesses and we want to enable access to the most effective medical treatments available," Ley said.
But growing cannabis for recreational purposes will still be illegal in Australia.
